show.subtitle: Charlene Spretnak and her guests track the progress of the “Big Make-over,” the cultural and political Relational Shift that is occurring in all fields as a result of recent discoveries that life is far more dynamically interrelated than modern societies have realized.
show.title: All Together Now

header.title: Women’s Voices Creating a New Politics

title: Women’s Voices Creating a New Politics
content:
A talk with Marianne Williamson about her upcoming national gathering, Sister Giant (sistergiant.com) on the need to... <!--more--> reframe the major political issues and also to get more women to run for office (marianne.com); the Women’s Congress for Future Generations (wcffg.
org); the Tea Party’s voter suppression actions; ATN’s Voter Registration Drive (deadline in most states is Oct.
6); poem by Mary Mackey
